colorTheory.description: The color palette combines a classic black and white foundation with a pop of teal for a modern touch.
colorTheory.mood: The palette exudes professionalism and modernity, with a hint of energy and vibrancy.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between the black text and white background ensures excellent readability. The teal accent color adds visual interest without compromising accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The black and white color scheme provides a strong base for content legibility, while the teal accent color adds a refreshing contrast and highlights key elements.
